protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor activity
protein.specific_function: Senses changes in the extracellular concentration of calcium ions. The activity of this receptor is mediated by a G- protein that activates a phosphatidylinositol-calcium second messenger system

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
